articles.author: Staff Writer
articles.title: Are AI glasses the next smartphone race between the US and China? - Nikkei Asia
articles.description: Meta Ray-Ban Display and rival devices may make personal AI agents a reality soon
articles.content: PALO ALTO, California -- Meta on Tuesday started selling its first AI glasses with built-in display, a futuristic device that attracted crowds outside its Burlingame, California, store as people line… [+8262 chars]
